mapper.update: UPDATE ORD_ORDER SET ORDER_STATE = -1, CANCELING_ORDER_OP_ID = #{cancelingOrderOpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CANCEL_REASON = #{cancelReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND ORDER_STATE=#{orderState,jdbcType=TINYINT}

UPDATE ORD_ORDER SET REAL_MONEY=#{realMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MODIFY_REALVERY_MONEY_OP_ID = #{modifyRealveryMoneyOpId,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE ID = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND ORDER_STATE=1
UPDATE ORD_ORDER SET ORDER_STATE = -1, CANCELING_ORDER_OP_ID = #{cancelingOrderOpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CANCEL_REASON = #{cancelReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID=${id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND ORDER_STATE=2

UPDATE ORD_ORDER SET ORDER_STATE = 3, LOGISTIC_CODE = #{logisticCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGISTIC_ID = #{logisticId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SEND_OP_ID = #{sendOpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE ID=${id} AND ORDER_STATE=#{orderState,jdbcType=TINYINT}

UPDATE ORD_ORDER SET ORDER_STATE=4, RECEIVED_TIME=#{receivedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RECEIVED_OP_ID=#{receivedOpId,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE ORDER_CODE=#{orderCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ORDER_STATE=#{orderState,jdbcType=TINYINT}
